channel.title: Apollo | Something I did while I was bored
channel.description:
I did this out of pure boredom, started last night and finished today when I got bored of it.
I didn't really do much, this is based off of the Apollo version that Major- put on Github (it had like bug fixes and stuff)
This is the changelog:
[code] ChatEventDecoder fix Player region changing fix Walking height level fix ThirdObjectActionEvent fix Combat level formula fix Item equipping fix 2-handed weapon equip fix SwitchItemEventDecoder fix SetInterfaceTextEventencoder fix 317 packet length fixes. Archive decoding fix Updated all assets to their newest version Removed multi revision support Removed JRuby scripting Replaced XML parsing with json Rewrote some of the JRuby core, translated to Java.[/code]
Yeah, I removed the JRuby scripting. Have a problem with it? Kiss my ass. I was going to implement another plugin language but didn't feel like writing the implementation. So I just converted the Ruby core to Java.
Lets see.. what else, I removed the multi-revision support, because fudge that, bug fixes.. yada yada, I converted the XML parsing to Json, I personally prefer Json because it's > *
Yeah, so uh, have fun.
[url=https://mega.co.nz/#!S1REwKwQ!LPkfkF2UYzYLA2e86_QEJFoEP5Jza1x9GSAD9Iag-3Y]apollo.zip (4.3 MB)[/url]

item.title: Apollo | Something I did while I was bored
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I have actually still been working on this (slowly) since the initial release, it has been hosted here. for awhile now.

Feel free to submit pull requests or create issues if you find any.

Read full topic
